verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Asaph. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* Mighty \w One|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w summons|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* where \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* rises \w to|strong="H1696"\w* where \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w sets|strong="H3996"\w*.
\w From|strong="H3313"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, perfect in \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, God \w shines|strong="H3313"\w* \w forth|strong="H3313"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H6440"\w* God approaches \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*! Consuming fire precedes \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tempest rages \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w summons|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H5920"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w His|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

“Gather \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*, who \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H5046"\w* \w His|strong="H5046"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w Himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w Judge|strong="H8199"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*

“\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*: \w I|strong="H8085"\w* am God, \w your|strong="H8085"\w* God.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H5930"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w are|strong="H5930"\w* \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H6499"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* need \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* stall \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w goats|strong="H6260"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* pens,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* Mine—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* cattle \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w hills|strong="H2042"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* creatures \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w are|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mine|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H8398"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w is|strong="H8398"\w* Mine, \w and|strong="H8398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fullness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof.

Do \w I|strong="H1320"\w* eat \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* bulls, \w or|strong="H1320"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*?

\w Sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thank|strong="H8426"\w* \w offering|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H2076"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H7999"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H2076"\w* \w the|strong="H2076"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.

\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w*.”

\w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, however, God \w says|strong="H6310"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* right \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* recite \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w lips|strong="H6310"\w*?

\w For|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w My|strong="H7993"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w My|strong="H7993"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* behind \w you|strong="H8130"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, \w you|strong="H5973"\w* befriend \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* throw \w in|strong="H2506"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w lot|strong="H2506"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7971"\w* unleash \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* harness \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* malign \w your|strong="H5414"\w* brother; \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w slander|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* own mother’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*; \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w thought|strong="H1819"\w* \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* accuse \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* consider \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w who|strong="H7911"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* God, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* I \w tear|strong="H2963"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w to|strong="H4994"\w* \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*, with \w no|strong="H6435"\w* \w one|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H4994"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w*:

\w He|strong="H7760"\w* who \w sacrifices|strong="H2076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thank|strong="H8426"\w* \w offering|strong="H2076"\w* \w honors|strong="H3513"\w* \w Me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* who rightly \w orders|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H2076"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* God.”
